SELECT @RN2:=@RN2+1 AS RNUM, TB2.* FROM( SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS ROWNUM, TB.* FROM( SELECT a.EMAIL , a.LAST_NM , a.FIRST_NM , a.NICK_NM , a.BIRTHDAY , a.GENDER , a.AFFILIATION , a.MOBILE_NO , a.PWD , a.GRADE , a.DEL_YN , a.CRE_DT , a.CRE_ID , a.UPD_DT , a.UPD_ID
, b.CAREER_SEQ , b.START_DT , b.END_DT , b.CAFFILIATION , b.CONTENTS , DATE_FORMAT(a.CRE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREDT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N') AS totalCnt FROM TB_MEMBER a, tb_career b WHERE a.DEL_YN = 'N' AND a.EMAIL = #{email} and a.email = b.EMAIL ORDER BY a.CRE_DT ) TB, (SELECT @RN:=0) R ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) TB2, (SELECT @RN2:=0) R
